rukus.text: Ne toto khwahelesia Abandu ba Firaun eshinyasio khu mika, nende okhubalemelia ebiamo mbu khobanyoole okhwitsulila

Obulayi nibwabolelanga baboolanga mbu; “Buno ni shichira efwe” ne obubii nibubetsela babura khu Musa nende abali ninaye. Toto obubii buboolelanga obo burula khu Nyasaye, (sichila amabii kabu) halali abaanji mubo shibamanyile tawe
Nibaboola mbu; “Kata nimwitsa nende eshimanyisio shiosi shiosi mbu okhuloche nasho shikhulakhusuubila tawe
Mana nikhubarumila imbumbuyeka nende tsisiche, nende tsikhungu nende amashele nende amalasile, okhuba ebimanyisio ebia habulafu, mana nibakhola obufuru ni baba Abandu abamabii

Ne eshinyasio nishakhamala okhubanyoola baboola mbu; “Ewe Musa khusabile Nyasaye wuwo khu kalia akayakhulaka. Nokhurusiliao eshinyasio shino toto khulakhusuubila ne toto khulakhulekhulila Abana ba Israil otsie ninabo
Ne ngala khubayiniliao eshinyasio, okhula ebise bindi, bafunakanga indache
Mana nikhubarunjia nikhubasishia munyanza shichila liyinji liabu khubimanyisio biefu, nende okhubula nabio oluchendo

Mana nikhuchelamia- nikhuhelesia- Abandu balolekhananga abateshele, ebukwe nende mumbo weshialo ewakhwarayo tsikhabi. Mana likhuwa lilayi lia- Nyasaye nilileng’ana khubaana ba Israil, khulwa okhwisumilisia khwabu, mana nikhusishia aka Firaun yakholanga nende Abandu bebe, nende bilia ebiabombakhanga

Mana nikhubusia Abaana ba Israil munyanza mana nibabura khubandu balamanga ebifwanani, nibaboola mbu; “Ewe Musa, khukholele Abanyasaye fwesi shingala Abandu abo boosi bali nende Abanyasaye” Naboola mbu; “Toto enywe muli Abandu bakholanga obusilu.”
“Bano akabali ninako kano ketsa okhusikha ne ni amakhaya akabakholanga.”
Naboola; “koo ebakonyele Abanyasaye abundu wa Nyasaye, naye niye owabachingula hekulu okhushila Abandu boosi

“Ne (yitsulile) olwa khwabahabina khu Firaun nende Abandu be, ababetsanga eshinyasio, eshibii muno olwa beranga Abana benyu abasiani, nibalekha abakhana abalamu, ne mu ako kali amatemo amakhongo okhurula khu Nyasaye wenyu
